column4: Inbound Leestown Rd at New Circle Rd
column5: Vehicles in the intersection.  All inbound lanes are shutdown just prior to the overpass.  Inbound traffic diverted to the outer loop of New Circle Rd.  The outbound left turn to New Circle Rd is also shutdown.

column4: Inbound S Broadway at Angliana Ave
column5: Pedestrian reportedly involved.  At least one lane is blocked.

column4: Inbound Tates Creek Rd past Clearwater Way
column5: A single vehicle reportedly struck a deer.
